name: German Renewable Energy Federation
goal: The German Renewable Energy Federation (BEE) is an umbrella organization that represents the interests of 48 associations and companies, with 30,000 individual members, including 5,000 companies. Our members include the German Wind Energy Association (Bundesverband WindEnergie), the German Solar Association (Bundesverband Solarwirtschaft), the German Biogas Association (Fachverband Biogas) and the Federal Association of German Hydroelectric Power Plants (Bundesverband Deutscher Wasserkraftwerke). We represent some 330,000 workplaces and more than 3 million power plant operators. Our goal is 100 per cent renewable energy within the electricity, heating and transport sectors.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Clean Energy Package: Renewable Energy Directive, Internal Energy Market, Governance 2030
